mapper.select: SELECT pk_product_order_b as pkProductOrderB, pk_product as pkProduct, pk_product_order as pkProductOrder, product_num as productNum, memo, creator, creationtime, dr, ts FROM bill_product_order_b WHERE dr = 0 AND pk_product_order = #{pkProductOrder}

SELECT bpoh.pk_product_order as pkProductOrder, bpoh.contract_no as contractNo, bpoh.pk_customer as pkCustomer, bcuone.name as customerName, bcuone.tel as customerTel, bcuone.corpaddress, bpoh.pk_psndoc as pkPsndoc, bpoh.pk_takeover as pkTakeover, bpoh.material_source as materialSource, bpoh.material_source as materialSourceShow, bpoh.taxinclud, bpoh.urgent, bpoh.urgent as urgentShow, bpoh.transport_type as transportType, bpoh.transport_type as transportTypeShow, bpoh.payment_type as paymentType, bpoh.payment_type as paymentTypeShow, bpoh.creator, bcu.name as creatorShow, bpoh.creationtime, bpoh.modifier, bcut.name as modifierShow, bpoh.modifiedtime, bpoh.dr, bpoh.ts, bpoh.bill_state as billState FROM bill_product_order_h bpoh LEFT JOIN bd_customer bcuone ON bcuone.pk_customer = bpoh.pk_customer AND bcuone.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customer bcu ON bpoh.pk_customer = bcu.pk_customer AND bcu.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customer bcut ON bpoh.modifier = bcut.pk_customer AND bcut.dr = 0 WHERE bpoh.dr = 0 AND bpoh.bill_state = 30
AND bpoh.pk_psndoc = #{billProductOrderHPo.pkPsndoc}

SELECT count(bporderb.pk_product_order_b) FROM bill_product_order_b bporderb LEFT JOIN bill_product_order_h bporderh on bporderh.pk_product_order = bporderb.pk_product_order AND bporderb.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_product bp on bporderb.pk_product = bp.pk_product and bp.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customer bcu ON bp.pk_customer = bcu.pk_customer AND bcu.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customer bcuser ON bp.creator = bcuser.pk_customer AND bcuser.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customer bcusert ON bp.modifier = bcusert.pk_customer AND bcusert.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN sm_user sutre ON bp.approver = sutre.userid AND sutre.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_psndoc bpdoc ON bp.pk_psndoc = bpdoc.pk_psndoc AND bpdoc.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customdoc bcusdocPur ON bp.purchase_contacts = bcusdocPur.pk_customdoc AND bcusdocPur.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customdoc bcusdocSkill ON bp.skill_contacts = bcusdocSkill.pk_customdoc AND bcusdocSkill.dr = 0 WHERE bporderb.dr = 0 AND bporderh.bill_state = 30
AND bporderb.pk_product_order = #{billProductOrderHPo.pkProductOrder}

SELECT bp.pk_product AS pkProduct, bp.name, bp.code, bp.model, bp.pk_psndoc AS pkPsndoc, bpdoc.psnname AS pkPsndocShow, bp.purchase_contacts AS purchaseContacts, bcusdocPur.telnum AS purchaseContactsPhone, bp.skill_contacts AS skillContacts, bcusdocSkill.telnum AS skillContactsPhone, bp.smt, bp.dip, bp.isinstal, bp.instal_min AS instalMin, bp.istest, bp.test_min AS testMin, bp.pcb_char_color AS pcbCharColor, bp.pcb_resist_cover AS pcbResistCover, bp.pcb_pad_spary AS pcbPadSpary, bp.pcb_copper_thick AS pcbCopperThick, bp.pk_customer AS pkCustomer, bcu.name AS customerName, bcu.code AS customerCode, bp.order_number AS orderNumber, bp.order_number AS orderNumber, bp.bom_filename AS bomFilename, bp.bom_filefullname AS bomFilefullname, bp.pcb_filename AS pcbFilename, bp.pcb_filefullname AS pcbFilefullname, bp.craft_filename AS craftFilename, bp.craft_filefullname AS craftFilefullname, bp.ismake_tool AS ismakeTool, bp.make_steel_mesh AS makeSteelMesh, bp.make_dip AS makeDip, bp.make_test AS makeTest, bp.make_defense AS makeDefense, bp.make_aging AS makeAging, bp.task_id AS taskId, bporderb.approver, sutre.user_name AS approverShow, bporderb.approvetime, bporderb.bill_state AS billState, bp.creator, bcuser.name AS creatorOrderShow, bp.creationtime, bp.modifier, bcusert.name AS modifierOrderShow, bp.modifiedtime, bp.dr, bp.ts, bp.special_technics AS specialTechnics, bporderb.process_instance_id AS processInstanceId, bp.technics_state AS technicsState, bp.order_count AS orderCount, bporderb.product_num as productNum, bporderb.pk_product_order_b as pkProductOrderB FROM bill_product_order_b bporderb LEFT JOIN bill_product_order_h bporderh on bporderh.pk_product_order = bporderb.pk_product_order AND bporderb.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_product bp on bporderb.pk_product = bp.pk_product and bp.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customer bcu ON bp.pk_customer = bcu.pk_customer AND bcu.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customer bcuser ON bp.creator = bcuser.pk_customer AND bcuser.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customer bcusert ON bp.modifier = bcusert.pk_customer AND bcusert.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN sm_user sutre ON bporderb.approver = sutre.userid AND sutre.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_psndoc bpdoc ON bp.pk_psndoc = bpdoc.pk_psndoc AND bpdoc.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customdoc bcusdocPur ON bp.purchase_contacts = bcusdocPur.pk_customdoc AND bcusdocPur.dr = 0 LEFT JOIN bd_customdoc bcusdocSkill ON bp.skill_contacts = bcusdocSkill.pk_customdoc AND bcusdocSkill.dr = 0 WHERE bporderb.dr = 0 AND bporderh.bill_state = 30
AND bporderb.pk_product_order = #{billProductOrderHPo.pkProductOrder}
